field.name: maxslides
field.label: Max Number of Slides
field.description: Total or maximum number of slides to show.

field.name: links
field.label: Enable Links
field.description: Enable links on image and caption.

field.name: linksource
field.label: Link Source
field.description: Slideshow item link source
field.option: Surrounding Image Link (Requires Article or Category as Source Type)
Article (Requires Article or Category as Source Type)
XML Link Property (Requires XML File as Source Type)

field.name: link_preserveattribs
field.label: Preserve Link attributes
field.description: Preserve HTML attributes from the original A tag.

field.name: discs
field.label: Show Discs
field.description: Show disc navigation with slider.

field.name: paddles
field.label: Show Paddles
field.description: Show prev/next navigation in the form of paddles that appear over the slider upon mouse over.

field.name: imagecount
field.label: Images per Article
field.description: Maximum number of images to show per article.

field.name: image_preserveattribs
field.label: Preserve IMG attributes
field.description: Preserve HTML attributes from the original IMG tag (excludes src, width and height).

field.name: removeimages
field.label: Remove Other Images
field.description: JiSlider will automatically use the first image found within an article. This option will remove all the other images.

field.name: width
field.label: Slider Width
field.description: Width of the slider. Can be in the format of 100, 100px, or 100%

field.name: height
field.label: Slider Height
field.description: Height of the slider. Can be in the format of 100, 100px, or 100%

field.name: padding
field.label: Padding
field.description: Padding applied to each slide item. Use the shorthand CSS padding format for this field. In the case of multiple slides per page the inner padding will be automatically reduced.

field.name: autosizing
field.label: Auto Sizing
field.description: Auto-sizing for images that do not exactly fill the slider container

field.name: verticalAlign
field.label: Vertical Alignment
field.description: Vertical alignment of slide when slide is smaller than the slider container

field.name: horizontalAlign
field.label: Horizontal Alignment
field.description: Horizontal alignment of slide when slide is smaller than the slider container

field.name: sli_thumbs_resize
field.label: Resize Images
field.description: Resize images using the following rules

field.name: sli_thumbs_width
field.label: Image Width
field.description: Width of thumbnail image in pixels (please do not include the 'px' suffix)

field.name: sli_thumbs_height
field.label: Image Height
field.description: Height of thumbnail image in pixels (please do not include the 'px' suffix)

field.name: sli_thumbs_quality
field.label: Image Quality
field.description: Quality of the thumbnail image where 100 is no compression and 0 is fully compressed

field.name: sli_thumbs_keepratio
field.label: Maintain Aspect Ratio
field.description: Keep the same ratio for the thumbnails as the original image

field.name: sli_thumbs_cropcenter
field.label: Crop Center
field.description: Crop thumbnail centered to original image

field.name: sli_thumbs_fill
field.label: Aspect Fill
field.description: Scale up the thumbnail to fill the defined thumbnail dimensions

field.name: sli_thumbs_xcenter
field.label: Center X
field.description: If the thumbnail is smaller than the defined width, it will be centered horizontally

field.name: sli_thumbs_ycenter
field.label: Center Y
field.description: If the thumbnail is smaller than the defined height, it will be centered vertically

field.name: titles
field.label: Show Titles
field.description: Show titles with slides.

field.name: title_width
field.label: Title Width
field.description: Width of the title element

field.name: title_halign
field.label: Title Alignment
field.description: Horizontal alignment of title when smaller than the slider container

field.name: title_tag
field.label: Title Tag
field.description: Title Tag

field.name: captions
field.label: Show Captions
field.description: Show captions with slides.

field.name: caption_style
field.label: Caption Style
field.description: Caption style

field.name: caption_width
field.label: Caption Width
field.description: Width of the title element

field.name: caption_halign
field.label: Caption Alignment
field.description: Horizontal alignment of caption when smaller than the slider container

field.name: caption_nocurly
field.label: Remove Plugin Code
field.description: Remove plugin code {curlycode}{/curlycode}

field.name: caption_striptags
field.label: Strip HTML Tags
field.description: Remove HTML tags and only keep plain text

field.name: caption_excludedtags
field.label: Excluded Tags
field.description: Optionally exclude certain tags

field.name: caption_truncate
field.label: Crop Caption Text
field.description: Crop the caption text to a set number of characters

field.name: caption_length
field.label: Cropped Caption Length
field.description: Desired length for the caption (spaces are included as characters and HTML will be preserved)

field.name: readmores
field.label: Show Readmores
field.description: Show readmore links with slides.

field.name: readmore_text
field.label: Readmore Text
field.description: Readmore title text

field.name: uniqueclass
field.label: Unique Class
field.description: Each slider needs to have a unique CSS class to ensure multiple sliders can exist on the same page

field.name: numberslides
field.label: Number Slides Per Page
field.description: Set how many slides to be displayed per page.

field.name: transition
field.label: Transition
field.description: Slider transition between slides.

field.name: speed
field.label: Transition Speed
field.description: Milliseconds it takes to slide to next slide.

field.name: delay
field.label: Slide Delay
field.description: Milliseconds to wait before showing next slide.

field.name: autoplay
field.label: Auto Play
field.description: Automatically start playing through slides as soon as the slider loads.

field.name: responsive
field.label: Responsive
field.description: Slider responds to window size changes. TIP: Ensure the width has a percentage prefix (%) to get the most out of this feature.

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Load jQuery
field.description: Allow jQuery loading as required.

field.name: thumbs_cache
field.label: Cache Thumbnails
field.description: Only create a new thumbnail when image does not exist in cache (disabling this and refreshing your content is an easy way to clear the cache)

field.name: trigger_events
field.label: Trigger Events
field.description: Trigger content plugin events.
